_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Navidrome
author: pterodactyl@astrid.email
description: Navidrome is a self-hosted, open source music server and streamer. It gives you freedom to listen to your music collection from any browser or mobile device.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

cd /mnt/server

cat > navidrome.toml << EOF
MusicFolder = "/home/container/library/"
DataFolder = "/home/container/data/"
Port = 8080
EOF
echo -e "\Created base configuration file\n"

mkdir ./library
mkdir ./data
mkdir ./navidrome

echo -e "\nUpdating\n"
apt update

echo -e "\Installing dependencies\n"
apt install vim ffmpeg wget -y -qq

wget https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/releases/download/v0.51.1/navidrome_0.51.1_linux_amd64.tar.gz -O Navidrome.tar.gz
tar -xvzf Navidrome.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/navidrome
rm Navidrome.tar.gz

echo -e "\nServer successfully installed\n"
